question: Devaluation of a currency means
option1: reduction in the value of a currency vis-a-vis major internationally traded currencies
option2: permitting the currency to seek its worth in the international market
option3: fixing the value of the currency in conjunction with the movement in the value of a basket of pre-determined currencies
option4: fixing the value of currency in multilateral consultation with the IMF, the World Bank and major trading partners
answer: reduction in the value of a currency vis-a-vis major internationally traded currencies
